about_the_game:
Adventures need to start somewhere, and being a novice is completely okay! We got you covered! The 4 Goddesses Online Novice Class Weapon Set gives the 4 Goddesses two weapons to choose from! The 4 Goddesses Online Novice Class Weapon Set includes:

Neptune
Blue Longsword
Violet Sword

Noire
Scarlet Rapier
Elven Rapier

Blanc
Clever Priest Staff
Sacred Rod

Vert
Red Spear
Gold Spear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card

short_description: The 4 Goddesses Online Novice Class Weapon Set prepares your 4 Goddesses their early essentials to start off the daily grind!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
